languages.text: "Я рад{mf||а}, что ты была рядом со мной все это время".
"I am glad you have been at my side all this time."
languages.original_text: "Я рад{mf||а}, что ты была рядом со мной все это время".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad you were at my side this entire time."
"I am glad you were at my side this entire time."
"I am glad you have been at my side all this time."
"I am glad you have been at my side all this time."
"I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

languages.text: “我很高兴你一直都能在我身边。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你一直都能在我身边。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de haberla tenido a mi lado todo este tiempo».
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de haberla tenido a mi lado todo este tiempo».

languages.text: 「お前がいつも味方でいてくれたこと、嬉しく思う」
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がいつも味方でいてくれたこと、嬉しく思う」

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr die ganze Zeit über an meiner Seite wart."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr die ganze Zeit über an meiner Seite wart."

languages.text: « Merci d'être restée à mes côtés pendant tout ce temps. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."

traits.locale_text: « Merci d'être restée à mes côtés pendant tout ce temps. »

languages.text: "Bunca zamandır yanımda olduğun için çok şanslıyım."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you have been at my side all this time."
